Title: The tag cloud
Description: A tag cloud implementation for ASP.NET and ASP.NET MVC applications. The generic nature of the implementation makes it easy to use either in a ASP.NET or ASP.NET MVC application. The code is written in C# 3.0 using some of the latest language features like Linq, object initializers and Lambda expressions.

Project Description
A tag cloud implementation for ASP.NET and ASP.NET MVC applications. The generic nature of the implementation makes it easy to use either in a ASP.NET or ASP.NET MVC application. The code is written in C# 3.0 using some of the latest language features like Linq, object initializers and Lambda expressions.
